content.text: Foless was a planet in the Colonies on the periphery of the Inner Rim, near Atzerri. It sat at the interscetion of the Shipwrights' Trace with the Corellian Trade Spine, known as the Foless Crossroads.
Foless was explored sometime between 20,000 BBY and 15,000 BBY.
During the Jedi Civil War, the planet was the site of a battle won by the Republic.
By 25 ABY, Foless boasted a population of 10 billion to 100 billion sentients.

elements.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Strange Allies
Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook
